name: Houston Metro
description: One of the priorities for the Metropolitan Transit Authority of Harris County is to be a trusted community partner. One way to partner is to open up our live, real-time data to students, aspiring software developers, and entrepreneurs. With this data and the associated APIs, you can start developing transit based applications for web or mobile devices.
